title: Both clients failing to patch please help
body: I tried legacy and alpha client both are failing to patch

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages?  If so, at what percent?  I'd like to help but there isn't much to work from here.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O79Ktwd3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-14T17:53:19.361+0000)
>
> Are you getting any error messages?  If so, at what percent?  I'd like to help but there isn't much to work from here.

in the alpha client says
patching failed we not sure why.Please restart the client to try patching again (error 004)
in legacy says
Unspecified error  occurred. Please check logs for more information
